tool_description: Harmonized System, Classification, Taxes and Rates API, Import/Export Restrictions, Landed cost calculation
name: CustomsRates API
title: CustomsRates API

api_list.name: /classification/{countryCode}
/geoData/{countryCode}
/restrictions/np

hsCode.description: HS Code in the corresponding country tariff

api_list.name: /restrictions/parties/search
/countries/{countryCode}/landedCost/{hsCode}/{sourceCountryCode}
/countries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://customsrates-api.p.rapidapi.com/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "customsrates-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://customsrates-api.p.rapidapi.com/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "customsrates-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

countryCode.description: 2-character ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 code of the country

currencyCode.description: The 3 letter ISO code of the currency

api_list.name: /restrictions/items
/countries/{countryCode}

countryCode.description: 2-character ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 code of the country

name.description: The name of the cost calculation item. This is unique per country

type.description: The type of the cost calculation item.

valuationBase.description: The valuation base that should be used when calculating the value of the cost item. It can contain a single value or a formula. The formula may contain any local Cost Calculation item names, e.g: "VAT + DUTY" Static values: CIF | CIFD | CIFS | COST

domain.description: Direction of the trade where this calculation item is applicable

countriesOfOrigin.description: A list of countries that are associated with the cost calculation item

shipFromCountries.description: A list of countries that are associated with the cost calculation item

shipmentMethod.description: List of shipment methods, associated with the rule

items.description: possible options: post, sea, air, courier, cargo, travel

nonZeroRate.description: if the rate is not zero in this rule, e.g. 2,5%

exemptBelowValBase.description: If value of the goods (CIF, FOB etc. according to the valuation base) is below this number, than levy is not charged

exemptBelowCharge.description: if the total levy is below this number, than not charged

exemptBelowLandedCost.description: if total landed cost is below this number, than levy is not charged

altCurrency.description: Alternative currency for this rule. For example, in Ukraine, despite default currency UAH, some of the items are assessed in EUR during customs valuation

altValuationBase.description: If default valuation base is CIF, but this specific rule is based on FOB, for example

notExemptedCodes.description: List of headings (4-digit HS codes) excluded from this rule

items.description: 4-digit HS code (heading), excluded from this rule

shipFromCountries.description: List of ship-from countries, valid for this rule

countriesOfOrigin.description: List of countries of origin, valid for this rule

specialType.description: Special type can be gift, officialGift, sample, enRouteUse

countryGroups.description: Country groups defined by the local authorities and used in the cost calculation items

code.description: Country group code. If this is set, countryCode is undefined

countryCodes.description: List of 2-character ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 codes of the countries, associated with the group

externalVersion.description: Version to display to the users

zzRate.description: The code of the ERGA OMNES rate

defaultValuationBase.description: Default Valuation Base for duties and taxes (e.g. CIF, FOB etc.)

declarableLength.description: Length of the HS code with duties and taxes attached

tariff.description: Is tariff data for this country available?

classification.description: Is classification data for this country available?

geoData.description: Is geo data for this country available?

api_list.name: /countries/{countryCode}/tradeData/{hsCode}

updatedOn.description: Unix timestamp when the record was last updated

hsCode.description: The harmonized tariff schedule code formatted as the official source defines it

level.description: The level of the HTS Code in the HS Tree. Section is level 0.

countryCode.description: 2-character ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 code of the country

createdOn.description: Unix timestamp when the record was first created

indent.description: The indentation of the element in the harmonized tariff schedule. This does not equal with the level.

itemLevelDescription.description: The lowest, item level description of the item

fullDescription.description: The item level descriptions of each parent concatenated. This field is auto-generated upon insert and should not be set.

name.description: The name of the rate. This name is the unique identifier of the associated CostCalculationItem

itemLevelDescription.description: The lowest, item level description of the item

fullDescription.description: The item level descriptions of each parent concatenated. This field is auto-generated upon insert and should not be set.

minValue.description: The minimum value of the rate - if not defined, there is no minimum. This may contain a flat percentage or a more complex formula for calculation

maxValue.description: The minimum value of the rate - if not defined, there is no maximum. This may contain a flat percentage or a more complex formula for calculation

excludedCountries.description: A list of 2 letter ISO country codes that are otherwise associated with the cost calculation item, but shoulde be excluded for this given rate
